long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Repository Hosting is an online hosting service for software project management tools. We specialize in hosting Trac, Subversion, Git, and Mercurial repositories. 

However, unlike our competitors, we strive to make hosted project management simple again. Our motto is "One Plan, One Price". $6.00 per month buys you unlimited repositories, users, Trac projects, and backups â€” AND 2GB of storage. 

Repository Hosting was founded in January 2009. Since then we have added many new features, such as free backups, interoperability with other online services, shared drives, custom branding, agile workflows, and time tracking.  Our services are provided in English, Simplified Chinese, and Russian.
